long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DataCapture Connect empowers you to easily extract data from social media posts and e-commerce product listings with a single click. Whether you're browsing Facebook, LinkedIn, Amazon, or Flipkart, this extension adds a custom button to each post or product, allowing you to seamlessly capture relevant data. The button's behavior and functionality are configured directly from the HANA platform, giving you full control over what data to collect and where to send it.

With this extension, you can:

Capture data directly from social media posts and e-commerce listings.
Automatically push data to the HANA platform for CRM, ERP, or custom software solutions.
Customize the button's configuration through HANA for dynamic data collection tailored to your business needs.
Ideal for businesses looking to streamline data integration, DataCapture Connect is the perfect tool for transforming web data into actionable insights with ease.

Features:

One-click data capture from posts or products.
Seamless data integration with HANA for software building (CRM, ERP, etc.).
Fully configurable button behavior via HANA.
Supports major social and e-commerce platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn, Amazon, and Flipkart.
How to Use:

Install the extension and log in to your HANA account.
Navigate to any supported social media or e-commerce site.
Click the newly added button on any post or product to capture data.
View and manage collected data on your HANA platform for further processing.
Permissions:

Access to social media posts and e-commerce product listings for data capture.
Ability to communicate with the HANA platform for data syncing.
